rooms.name: The Bottom of the Rainbow
rooms.description:
You are standing before a shimmering rainbow arching high up into the
sky.  You feel somehow separated from the natural world, even though the
temple spire is only a few meters below you.

up.description: The rainbow extends above you, fading out of existence only meters away.

down.description: You can see the Temple of Midgaard below you.

extra_descriptions.description:
The rainbow softly glows with beams of light, in colours that defie
description.

rooms.name: On the Rainbow
rooms.description:
You are standing on the rainbow, surrounded by many beams of multicoloured
light.  Through the bottom of the rainbow you can barely make out the Temple
of Midgaard, which is now quite far away.

up.description: The rainbow extends far above you, slowly fading into darkness.

down.description: The rainbow extends below you towards Midgaard.

extra_descriptions.description:
The rainbow softly glows with beams of light, in colours that defie
description.

rooms.name: On the Rainbow
rooms.description:
You are standing on the rainbow, surrounded by many beams of multicoloured
light.  Through the bottom of the rainbow you see the City of Midgaard and the
land surrounding it.  It seems to be miles below you.

up.description: The rainbow extends far above you, slowly fading into darkness.

down.description: The rainbow extends below you towards the land you once knew as home.

extra_descriptions.description:
The rainbow softly glows with beams of light, in colours that
defie description.

rooms.name: On the Rainbow
rooms.description:
You are standing on the rainbow, surrounded by many beams of multicoloured
light.  The rainbow extends above and below you as far as you can see.

up.description:
The rainbow extends far above you.  You see a glowing white light at the
rainbow's end.

down.description: The rainbow extends far below you, slowly fading into darkness.

extra_descriptions.description:
The rainbow brightly glows with beams of light, in colours that defie any
description.

rooms.name: On the Rainbow
rooms.description:
You are nearing the end of the rainbow.  The beams of multicoloured
light have begun to merge and solidify.  All around you you see glowing
starlike motes of dust.  Ahead of you is a bridge.

up.description:
The rainbow extends above you, merging into a brilliant glowing
bridge.

down.description: The rainbow extends far below you, slowly fading into darkness.

extra_descriptions.description:
The colors of the rainbow seem to converge into a glowing bridge that leads
to a massive white gate.

The star-like motes dance before your eyes.  They are incredibly beautiful yet
intangible -- your hand passes right through them.

The rainbow brilliantly glows with beams of blinding light, in colours that
sweep together and merge before your eyes.

rooms.name: The Glowing Bridge at the Rainbow's End
rooms.description:
After a long climb you have reached the end of the rainbow.  The brilliant
colours have twisted and merged into a beautiful glowing bridge that leads
toward a massive white gate to the north.  All around you is a soft, peaceful
glow interrupted only by the passing of starlike dust motes before your eyes.

north.description:
The bridge leads on to a massive white gate.  You see a large grey figure
standing there.

down.description:
The bridge disassociates into a beautiful spectrum of colours that
drop out of sight below you.

extra_descriptions.description:
The gate towers tens of feet above your heads.  Beyond it is a field of utter
blackness, from which the motes of light seem to issue forth.
The bridge glows with an unearthly light.

The star-like motes dance before your eyes.  They are incredibly beautiful yet
intangible -- your hand passes right through them.

The rainbow seems to be forming directly from the light of the bridge.  It
drops out of sight below you.

rooms.name: The Astral Gate
rooms.description:
Here the bridge ends before a massive, pearly-coloured gate beyond which
you can see a field of blackness filled with silvery snake-like tendrils,
stars, and occasional flashes of of light.

north.description:
Through the gate you see a massive field of blackness that extends as far
as you can see.

south.description:
The bridge extends towards the rainbow, which drops out of sight
below you.

extra_descriptions.description:
The plaque reads:
Let this gate stand to protect mortal man for all time against the perils of
the outer planes of existence and the creatures fair and foul that dwell within.
(The Astral Plane and Githyanki Keep were written by Andersen.)

You see a huge, glowing gate wrought from an incredibly hard translucent
material.  Each of the intricately carved bars of this mighty gate are about
as thick as a man's wrist, rising from the floor to a height of forty feet.
A plaque is inset into the wall next to one side of the gate.

rooms.name: Into the Astral Plane
rooms.description:
You step through the gate, and into another reality...
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is very disorienting, although it is not too late to return
through the gate to the south.

north.description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

east.description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

south.description: The astral gate leads back to your world.

west.description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

up.description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

down.description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

extra_descriptions.description:
>From here the pearly-coloured gate seems very small and insubstantial.  Through
its bars you can see the Astral Guardian, protecting your world from the perils
of this plane of existence.

rooms.name: Exploring the Astral Plane
rooms.description:
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is very disorienting, and it is difficult to maintain your
bearings and sense of direction.

north.description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

east.description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

south.description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

west.description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

down.description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

rooms.name: Roaming the Astral Plane
rooms.description:
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is somewhat disorienting.
All exits lead off into the astral field.

north.description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

east.description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

south.description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

west.description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

All exits lead off into the astral field.

rooms.name: Wandering the Astral Plane
rooms.description:
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is highly disorienting.  Nearby you see a large silvery
strand of light.
Most exits lead off into the astral field.

north.description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

east.description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

south.description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

west.description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

up.description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

down.description: You see a tangible strand of silvery light.

rooms.name: Traversing the Astral Plane
rooms.description:
You find yourself deep within in a dark field filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is extremely disorienting, and you are having trouble
keeping your sense of direction.
All exits lead off into the astral field.

north.description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

east.description: The astral field leads off into the depths.

south.description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

west.description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

up.description: The astral field leads off into the depths.

down.description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is incredibly disorienting, and you are having trouble
keeping your senses straight.
All exits lead off into the astral field.

down.description: The astral field leads off into infinity.

rooms.name: Walking the Silvery Strand
rooms.description:
You are standing atop a silvery strand of light that twists and turns
through the astral field.

north.description: The strand of light twists and turns out of sight.

up.description: You see the infinite expanse of the astral field.

rooms.name: Walking the Silvery Strand
rooms.description:
You are standing atop a silvery strand of light that twists and turns
through the astral field.

north.description: You see the infinite expanse of the astral field.

south.description: The strand of light twists and turns out of sight.

rooms.description:

south.description: The strand of light twists and turns out of sight.

down.description: You see the infinite expanse of the astral field.

rooms.name: Walking the Silvery Strand
rooms.description:
You are standing atop a silvery strand of light that twists and turns
through the astral field.

up.description: You see the endless expanse of the astral field.

down.description: You see the infinite expanse of the astral field.

rooms.name: Deep Within the Astral Plane
rooms.description:
You have travelled deep inside the astral field.  Here the fabric of the
field has become twisted and warped due to the proximity of another plane of
existence.  Some of the tendrils of light that line the astral field have been
warped and twisted into portals to other worlds.
Take care before you step through one -- you might never return.

north.description: The astral field leads on into the depths.

east.description: The astral field leads on into infinity.

south.description: The nexial link has been blocked by the gods for your protection.

west.description: The astral field leads on into the depths.

up.description: Through the nexial link you can see a stony keep.

down.description: The astral field leads on into infinity.

rooms.name: Inside the Githyanki Keep
rooms.description:
You are standing just inside a nexial portal that leads out onto the
Astral Plane.  It seems that you have found the lair of the Githyanki,
the once-human followers of Lord Gith.  Ahead of you stands a steel door
leading into the keep hewn from stone.

north.description: You see a rusty steel door which leads into the keep.

down.description: Below you is the nexial portal that leads into the astral plane.

extra_descriptions.description: The door is made from a set of rusting steel plates set deep into the stone.

rooms.name: A guard station
rooms.description:
This is a small building just inside the keep.  Doors lead out to the east
and west.  Some small weapons hang on hooks on the walls, for use in defense
of the keep.
Doors stand in all directions save north.

east.description: You see an iron door which leads out onto a grey stone road.

south.description: You see a rusty steel door which leads out to the nexial link.

west.description: You see an iron door which leads out onto a grey stone road.

extra_descriptions.description: The door is made from a set of iron plates set deep into the stone.
The door is made from a set of rusting steel plates set deep into the stone.

rooms.name: A grey road
rooms.description:
The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone.  A dull red
sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you
would commonly associate with a normal city.
The cobblestone road turns to the north, ending to the east at an iron door.

north.description: The grey cobblestones continue.

east.description:
You see an iron door which leads into a small stone building set into the wall
of the keep.

extra_descriptions.description: The door is made from a set of iron plates set deep into the stone.

rooms.name: A grey road
rooms.description:
The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone.  A dull red
sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you
would commonly associate with a normal city.
The cobblestone road continues to the north and south.  Doors to the east
and west lead into stone buildings.

north.description: The grey cobblestones continue.

east.description: You see a small stone building with a wooden door.

south.description: The grey cobblestones continue.

west.description: An iron door blocks your entrance into a large stone building.

extra_descriptions.description: The door is fashioned from many iron plates and set deep into the stone wall.
The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

rooms.name: A grey road
rooms.description:
The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone.  A dull red
sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you
would commonly associate with a normal city.
The cobblestone road turns to the south and continues on to the east.

east.description: The grey cobblestones continue.

south.description: The grey cobblestones continue.

rooms.name: A grey road
rooms.description:
The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone.  A dull red
sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you
would commonly associate with a normal city.
The cobblestone road continues to the east and west.  To the north you see a
massive building and a pair of large doors.

north.description: Looming before you is a forbidding pair of metal doors.

east.description: The grey cobblestones continue.

west.description: The grey cobblestones continue.

extra_descriptions.description:
The doors are formed from a silvery substance that feels very hard yet almost
slippery to the touch.  They are covered in images in bas-relief, depicting
scenes of combat between humans and strange tentacle-mouthed humanoids.

rooms.name: A grey road
rooms.description:
The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone.  A dull red
sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you
would commonly associate with a normal city.
The cobblestone road continues to the east and west.  A door to the south
leads into a tall stone building.

east.description: The grey cobblestones continue.

south.description: You see a tall stone building with a wooden door.

west.description: The grey cobblestones continue.

extra_descriptions.description: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

rooms.name: A grey road
rooms.description:
The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone.  A dull red
sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you
would commonly associate with a normal city.
The cobblestone road turns to the west and continues to the south.  A door
to the north leads into a tall stone building.

north.description: You see a tall stone building with a wooden door.

south.description: The grey cobblestones continue.

west.description: The grey cobblestones continue.

extra_descriptions.description: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

rooms.name: A grey road
rooms.description:
The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone.  A dull red
sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you
would commonly associate with a normal city.
The cobblestone road continues to the north and south.  To the east is a
door in a large stone building.

north.description: The grey cobblestones continue.

east.description: An iron door blocks your entrance into a large stone building.

south.description: The grey cobblestones continue.

extra_descriptions.description: The door is made from many hammered iron plates, set deep into the stone wall.

rooms.name: A grey road
rooms.description:
The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone.  A dull red
sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you
would commonly associate with a normal city.
The cobblestone road continues to the north and south.

north.description: The grey cobblestones continue.

south.description: The grey cobblestones continue.

rooms.name: A grey road
rooms.description:
The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone.  A dull red
sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you
would commonly associate with a normal city.
The cobblestone road turns to the north and continues on to the west.  To
the east is a door in a large stone building.

north.description: The grey cobblestones continue.

east.description: An iron door blocks your entrance into a large stone building.

west.description: The grey cobblestones continue.

extra_descriptions.description: The door is made from many hammered iron plates, set deep into the stone wall.

rooms.name: A grey road
rooms.description:
The ground beneath your feet is a uniformly grey cobblestone.  A dull red
sun hangs in an orange sky above your head; you hear none of the sounds you
would commonly associate with a normal city.
The cobblestone road goes on to the east, ending to the west at an iron door.
A door to the north leads into a small stone building.

north.description: You see a small stone building with a wooden door.

east.description: The grey cobblestones continue.

west.description:
You see an iron door which leads into a small stone building set into the wall
of the keep.

extra_descriptions.description: The door is made from a set of iron plates set deep into the stone.
The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

rooms.name: A small building
rooms.description:
You have stepped inside a dimly lit building, which apparently serves as
living quarters for several githyanki gish.  The walls are heavy stone blocks,
covered with panels of strangely knotted and twisted wood.  A couple of candles
burn dimly in sconces here and there.

west.description: The wooden door leads back out onto the grey cobblestone road.

extra_descriptions.description: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

rooms.name: A small building
rooms.description:
You have stepped inside a dimly lit building, which apparently serves as
living quarters for several githyanki gish.  The walls are heavy stone blocks,
covered with panels of strangely knotted and twisted wood.  A couple of candles
burn dimly in sconces here and there.

south.description: The wooden door leads back out onto the grey cobblestone road.

extra_descriptions.description: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

rooms.name: A large dwelling
rooms.description:
You have stepped inside a dimly lit building with vaulted ceilings and high
windows.  The walls are heavy stone blocks that rise tens of feet above your
head, covered with panels of strangely knotted and twisted wood.  On the floor
are charcoal stencils of pentagrams and various other ominous sigils.

north.description: The wooden door leads back out onto the grey cobblestone road.

extra_descriptions.description: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

rooms.name: The Githyanki Weaponry
rooms.description:
A large chamber, full of weapons in various states of completion.  Strange
glowing blocks of silvery metal are being pounded and rolled out into deadly
razor-sharp knives, daggers, and swords.
Sounds of hammering and blasts of heat and strange smells come from the open
doorway to the north.  An iron door stands to the west.

north.description: You see a massive forgeroom, lit by a white-hot furnace.

west.description: The iron door leads back out onto the grey cobblestone road.

extra_descriptions.description: The door is made from many hammered iron plates, set deep into the stone wall.

rooms.name: The Forge
rooms.description:
In the center of the room is a massive furnace which emits great gouts of
heat and a strange smell which comes from the melting of the silvery metal used
by the githyanki.  A large trough of icy water stands to the west, used for
quenching hot metal.
Doorways stand to the north and south.  The furnace door lies to the east.

north.description: You see the armoury.

east.description: Through the grille in the furnace door you see only flames.

south.description: You see the weaponry.

extra_descriptions.description:
The entire furnace is glowing white-hot to the touch.
The furnace door looks too hot to even attempt to open.

rooms.name: The Githyanki Armoury
rooms.description:
A large chamber, full of suits of armor in various states of completion.  In
this chamber the hard steels of the githyanki are shaped into ornately fashioned
suits of mail.
Sounds of hammering and blasts of heat and strange smells come from the open
doorway to the south.  An iron door stands to the west.

south.description: You see a massive forgeroom, lit by a white-hot furnace.

west.description: The iron door leads back out onto the grey cobblestone road.

extra_descriptions.description: The door is made from many hammered iron plates, set deep into the stone wall.

rooms.name: Inside the furnace
rooms.description:
You gasp for breath and choke on toxic sulphur and brimstone.  The sweat
on your forehead is instantly vaporized by the flames that surround you.  You
begin to feel faint and dizzy from the heat...
... you'd better leave before you pass out and burn to a cinder!

north.description: The flames blind you and obscure your vision.

east.description: The flames blind you and obscure your vision.

south.description: The flames blind you and obscure your vision.

west.description: The flames blind you and obscure your vision.

rooms.name: A guard station
rooms.description:
You are standing in a small, fairly empty building that serves as the prison
for the keep.  The building is small because the githyanki do not make a habit
of taking prisoners, and those that they do capture do not last long.
The cellblock lies to the west and the grey stone road is to the east.

east.description: You see an iron door which leads back out onto the grey cobblestone road.

west.description: You see the cellblock.

extra_descriptions.description: The door is fashioned from many iron plates and set deep into the stone wall.

rooms.name: The cellblock
rooms.description:
A torch flickers in the western wall, providing some illumination for this
dim corridor.  Some whips, manacles, and chains hang on the walls -- they seem
to have been used recently.
Cell doors stand to the north and south.  The guard station is to the east.

north.description: You see a small cell.

east.description: You see the guard station.

south.description: You see a small cell.

extra_descriptions.description:
The cell door is wooden and about 4' high, with a slot in the bottom to pass
food underneath to the prisoner.

rooms.name: A cramped cell
rooms.description:
You are in a tiny, cold, dank cell.
The only exit is back through the door to the south.

south.description: You see the cellblock.

extra_descriptions.description:
The cell door is wooden and about 4' high, with a slot in the bottom to pass
food underneath to the prisoner.

rooms.name: A tiny cell
rooms.description:
You are in a cold, dank, cramped cell.
The only exit is back through the door to the north.

north.description: You see the cellblock.

extra_descriptions.description:
The cell door is wooden and about 4' high, with a slot in the bottom to pass
food underneath to the prisoner.

rooms.name: A large dwelling
rooms.description:
You have stepped inside a dimly lit building with vaulted ceilings and high
windows.  The walls are heavy stone blocks that rise tens of feet above your
head, covered with panels of strangely knotted and twisted wood.  On the floor
are charcoal stencils of pentagrams and various other ominous sigils.

south.description: The wooden door leads back out onto the grey cobblestone road.

extra_descriptions.description: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

rooms.name: South End of the Hall
rooms.description:
This is a massive stone hall, lit by flaming blue stones set into the walls.
Massive suits of armor line the walls, holding weapons fashioned from a strange
silvery metal.
The great hall continues to the north and ends in a pair of huge metal doors
to the south.

north.description: The great hall continues to the north.

south.description: The metal doors lead out onto the grey cobblestone road.

extra_descriptions.description:
The doors are formed from a silvery substance that feels very hard yet almost
slippery to the touch.  They are covered in images in bas-relief, depicting
scenes of combat between humans and strange tentacle-mouthed humanoids.
Massive pole arms, spears, mighty swords, all kinds of death-dealing devices.
The suits of armor are very intricately and ornately fashioned splint mail.

rooms.name: North End of the Hall
rooms.description:
This is a massive stone hall, lit by flaming blue stones set into the walls.
Massive suits of armor line the walls, holding weapons fashioned from a strange
silvery metal.
The great hall continues to the south.  An archway leads into a dimly lit
room to the north.

north.description: You think you can see some steps leading up to an altar...

south.description: The great hall continues to the south.

extra_descriptions.description: The archway is shrouded in a strange black mist that obscures your vision.
Massive pole arms, spears, mighty swords, all kinds of death-dealing devices.
The suits of armor are very intricately and ornately fashioned splint mail.

rooms.name: The Altar Chamber
rooms.description:
Your eyes have trouble adjusting to the dim lighting.  All around you are
columnar statues of githyanki turned towards the altar standing at the top
of a series of steps.

north.description: The steps lead north and up to a massive sacrificial altar.

south.description: You think you can see the hall.

extra_descriptions.description: The archway is shrouded in a strange black mist that obscures your vision.

rooms.name: Before the Altar
rooms.description:
You have climbed the mighty steps of the altar chamber and stand before a
huge altar use to pay tribute to Lord Gish, long-dead ruler of the githyanki.
The altar is covered in blood and radiates unspeakable power that is absorbed
by the horrible presence which stands before you.

south.description: The steps lie to the south, leading back down to the altar chamber floor.

down.description: The floor of the altar is pockmarked with small holes, draining blood.

extra_descriptions.description: The holes have passed countless amounts of blood down below the altar.
The stains of blood run down off the altar towards your feet, oozing quietly.
The altar is a huge sacrificial altar covered in bloodstains.

rooms.name: A Gateway to the Underworld
rooms.description:
You step through the tiny hole in the altar, and stand before a swirling
field of blackness.  Through the field you can hear the howls of lost souls
and long-dead beings.

up.description: You see the altar chamber.

down.description:
You look down into the field of blackness, and feel a tangible wave of evil wash
over you.  Stepping into the field would be a bad idea.

extra_descriptions.description:
The field pulses and feeds on the blood dripping from above.
A tangible wave of hatred washes over you, striking fear into your very soul.
The blood drips from above your head and falls through the field...

rooms.name: Utter darkness and despair
rooms.description:
It is pitch black...
You are overwhelmed by the sensation of death and horrible pain as a shape
begins to coalesce before you.

mobiles.name: The Astral Guardian
mobiles.description: A grey figure guards the entrance to the astral plane.

mobiles.name: A pitch-black nightmare
mobiles.description: A nightmare is here, kicking at you with its flaming hooves.

mobiles.name: An evil night hag
mobiles.description: A night hag reaches out to steal your soul.

mobiles.name: An invisible stalker
mobiles.description: You see a wavy distortion in the air.

mobiles.name: A poor soulless being
mobiles.description: The soulless one wanders mindlessly.

mobiles.name: A githyanki hunter
mobiles.description: A githyanki hunter searches for signs of the githzerai.

mobiles.name: A githyanki warrior
mobiles.description: You see a humanoid figure clad in splinted armor.

mobiles.name: A githyanki guardian
mobiles.description: A humanoid figure clad in splinted armor blocks your way.

mobiles.name: A githyanki knight
mobiles.description: A tall figure armored in black observes you quietly.

mobiles.name: A githyanki protector
mobiles.description: A black knight of the githyanki protects his queen.

mobiles.name: An evil gish
mobiles.description: A small githyanki laughs at you through fanged teeth.

mobiles.name: An evil gish
mobiles.description: A gish laughs as flame leaps from his hands towards your face.

mobiles.name: A warlock of the Gith
mobiles.description: A humanoid figure stands here, holding a silvery sword.

mobiles.name: The lich-queen
mobiles.description: The evil lich-queen of the Gith reaches out to destroy you.

mobiles.name: Lord Gith
mobiles.description:
Lord Gith suddenly forms from a cloud of blackness.
He stares right through you with deadly, cold eyes.

mobiles.name: An insubstantial ghost
mobiles.description: A ghost wanders here, intent on destroying all life.

mobiles.name: An imprisoned githzerai
mobiles.description: A githzerai plots his escape plan.

mobiles.name: A tortured mindflayer prisoner
mobiles.description: A mindflayer lies here, scarred from the torture inflicted by the Gith.

mobiles.name: The enslaved red dragon
mobiles.description: A giant red dragon is chained here, his breath heating the furnace.

mobiles.name: A massive blast of fire
mobiles.description: The fires of the furnace burn away at your skin!

objects.name: a massive slate-grey sledgehammer
objects.description: The ground cracks under the weight of a grey hammer lying here.

objects.name: a violet scroll
objects.description: A rolled piece of violet parchment lies on the floor.

objects.name: a black etched tablet
objects.description: Lying on the ground is a jet black stone tablet.

objects.name: a scroll with githyanki writings on it
objects.description: You see a scroll written in an alien tongue.

objects.name: a small demon's amulet
objects.description: A small amulet lies here in the dirt.

objects.name: a devilish talisman
objects.description: On the ground is a small talisman which radiates a tangible evil.

objects.name: a silvery knife
objects.description: A flat-bladed silvery knife lies here.

objects.name: a silvery dagger
objects.description: A sharp-looking silvery dagger lies here.

objects.name: an extremely sharp and thin sword
objects.description: Light glints off the edge of a razor-sharp sword.

objects.name: a thin two-handed sword
objects.description: A heavy yet thinly bladed two-handed sword lies here.

objects.name: a silvery sword
objects.description: A silvery sword gleams unnaturally with an alien light.

objects.name: an iron barbed flail
objects.description: A rusty iron flail with wicked barbs on it tears at the ground.

objects.name: the unholy sword of the githyanki
objects.description: You feel tendrils of evil emanating from a wicked blade.

objects.name: a brightly flaming stone
objects.description: The room is lit by a hot blue flame coming from a small stone.

objects.name: some astral powder
objects.description: Twinkling powder floats before your eyes.

objects.name: a splint mail vest
objects.description: An intricately fashioned splint mail vest lies here.

objects.name: a splint mail skirt
objects.description: An intricately fashioned splint mail skirt lies here.

objects.name: a pair of splint mail sleeves
objects.description: A pair of intricately fashioned splint mail sleeves lie here.

objects.name: a pair of ornately designed gauntlets
objects.description: A pair of painstakingly designed ornate gauntlets lie here.

objects.name: a decaying vest made from cracked leather
objects.description: A decaying hunk of cracked leather has been discarded here.

objects.name: a violet potion
objects.description: A tall glass flask holds a translucent violet fluid.

objects.name: a vial of murky fluid
objects.description: A small vial contains a murky, sludge-like substance.

objects.name: a silvery-colored potion
objects.description: An octagonal vial holds a silvery-colored fluid that reflects light.

objects.name: a tasty-looking chocolate mint
objects.description: Someone has dropped a delicious-looking chocolate mint here.

objects.name: a black pentagram
objects.description: A small black metal pentagram has been left here.

objects.name: a rotting pouch
objects.description: A small pouch rots away on the floor here.
